questions.explanation:
Ocelot, Iowa.

	Gnaw Bone, Soddy Daisy, and Knob Lick are actual names of towns.

questions.text: What was the amount of money Roy won during his first professional tournament?

questions.explanation:
Vanessa Angel.

	Vanessa Angel was born in England.
